name: A NAtural TExt MArkups
short_description: ANATEMA is a natural way of information input since it is resembles a plain old email, but can be translated to any "modern" markup language such as LaTeX, HTML, DocBook, etc. Using ANATEMA, although, the original remains Human Readable.
